body_html:
Thanks a lot, tataodd. It seems in tensorflow 1.1.0 with this --copt="-Ofast", it could be compiled. Do you what's this option would doing during the compile process.
Another question is removing this option would decrease the tensorflow performance or not? Since I am running tensorflow on a intel xeon-phi TM platform which is targeting to hogh performance calculation.

body:
Thanks a lot, tataodd. It seems in tensorflow 1.1.0 with this --copt="-Ofast", it could be compiled. Do you what's this option would doing during the compile process. 
Another question is removing this option would decrease the tensorflow performance or not? Since I am running tensorflow on a intel xeon-phi TM platform which is targeting to hogh performance calculation.
